author: Ella Ceron
title: Canceling Earth Day Was Never An Option — So We Took Things Digital
description: We are living through multiple global emergencies, including a pandemic, exacerbated economic inequality, and a climate crisis that has been wreaking havoc on marginalized communities for decades. Despite these challenges, the youth climate movement will not …
